AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where aliens were transported, destination of illegal transportation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Guatemala: country of origin of the transported aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court that makes factual findings and applies sentencing guidelines, responsible for clarifying ultimate factual findings, calculated sentence imposed on Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.court of appeals: court reviewing sentence imposed by district court, giving due regard to district court's opportunity to judge witness credibility, governed review of the sentence imposed by CLARK
